COMMENT_TX: missing assists on rundown in CLE192204120
$George Uhle struck on pitching arm by pickoff throw
$Ernie Johnson and Johnny Mostill collided as Mostil caught the ball
$game called to allow Cleveland to catch a train (tie)
$the ball struck Wamby's glove then he kicked it over the RF line
$Joe Mulligan called for obstruction during rundown of Joe Wood
$Patsy Gharrity was put out after scoring when he retraced his steps to 3B; he spiked Guy Morton on the right leg
$the ball hit the top of the wall and broke through the wire onto Lexington Ave
$Doc Johnston rounded 2B too far; Fred Heimach was run down
$Joe Wood out on appeal for missing 2B after apparently scoring
$Riggs Stephenson hit on his right hand
$Jim Lindsey stumbled over 1B and turned his ankle
ej,ruthb101,P,dinnb101,Call at 2B (from LF) Babe Ruth ejected by 1B umpire Bill Dinneen for yelling from LF about the call at 2B
$police escorted the umpires off the field because there was much wrangling over their decisions
$heavy rain from here to the end of the game
$the throw hit Larry Gardner on the back
$Guy Morton pitched a complete game shutout in game 1
$the ball deflected from Jim Lindsey to Wamby, who threw to 1B instead of HP
ej,shanh101,P,nalld901,Bench jockeying Howie Shanks ejected by 1B umpire Dick Nallin
$Tris Speaker twisted his ankle sliding into HP
$the throw hit Steve O'Neill on the back

play,6,0,mostj101,??,,K play,6,0,strua102,??,,W play,6,0,mcclh103,??,,S8.1-3;B-2(TH3) play,6,0,schar103,??,,K play,6,0,robec101,??,,D7/7LD.3-H;2-H;BX3(75) game called due to rain after the top of the sixth; the sixth did not count
$George Mogridge dropped Dan Boone's fly; Luje Sewell was caught between the bases
$Joe Connolly out on appeal for missing 3B after apparently scoring
$the throw hit Charlie Jamieson on the back
$Mike Menosky called for interference for running out of the baseline to avoid the tag
$Joe Wood scored as Babe Ruth held the ball and Stuffy McInnis went to 3B as Wally Schang argued the call at HP
